description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. LaserBreaker is a fun game in which you have to destroy a target employing laser shots of four different colours. In each stage the target is protected by some blocks, which only can be destroyed by laser of its own colour.
description.short: LaserBreaker is a fun game in which you have to destroy a target employing laser shots of four different colours. In each stage the target is protected by some blocks, which only can be destroyed by laser of its own colour.
